C=E9dric Beust ? wrote:

>>What could be value of repeated test alone?
>>
>=

>>perfo=
rm rudimentary concurrency testing, but that is about it.
>>    
>>
>Stress=
/load testing mainly.
>
>It's also useful with the "partial failure" featur=
e of TestNG:
>
>@Test(invocationCount =3D 1000, successPercentage =3D 98)
>=
public void sendSms() {
>}
>
>This test will succeed if at least 980 invoca=
tions pass.  This is convenient
>when testing for unreliable networks or ro=
bustness in the face of a randomly
>simulated failure.
>  
>
  I see...

  =
Does TestNG allows to combine several annotations to define particular 
sce=
nario, e.g. multiple threads, N executions each? That is what I loved 
abou=
t JUnit 3 suites and decorators...

  Eugene
